content: this legal text summarizes the division of property between two individuals referred to as mr bg and mr vg the properties in question are located in municipality castelfidardo and include apartments garages and parking spaces these properties were inherited both parties have agreed to divide the properties into two shares with each party receiving specific units of real estate the value of each share is specified and the division is supported by floor plans and other relevant information the text also mentions a sale but the details are not provided
